### Mermaid Diagram  
Visualize workflows or processes easily with Mermaid diagrams.  

```{mermaid}
graph TD
    A[Start] --> B{Decision?}
    B -->|Yes| C[Proceed]
    B -->|No| D[Stop]
    C --> E[End]

```
